page.title: 14GAMES WE PLAY IN LEASINGHAM.
page.content: At home when we find a{tennis ball}we all gather round in a little circle. Then one person says"eeni-meeni-miney -mo-you are not it".We keep on doing this until the last person picks up the tennis ball and counts to ten.He runs around chasing every one and throws the tennis ball.If the tennis ball hits someone,that person has to pick up the ball and throw it at someone else.If another person gets hit by the tennis ball they have to try and and throw the ball at someone else.That game is called{tennis ball {tig. The next game is where the person that is"on"has to tig another person anywhere on the body and the person has to hold that part of the body and tig some one else on any part of the body.That game is called{Hospital {Tig.
